member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState
member.summary: Specifies the states of the Zune player.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Uninitialized
member.summary: The player is uninitialized.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Closed
member.summary: The player is closed.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Open
member.summary: The player is open.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Built
member.summary: The player is built.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Inactive
member.summary: The player is inactive.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.PlayerState.Dead
member.summary: The player is dead.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType
member.summary: Specifies the type of the current track in the Zune player.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType.Undefined
member.summary: The type of the track is undefined.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType.None
member.summary: There is no current track.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType.Music
member.summary: Indicates that the track is music.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType.Video
member.summary: Indicates that the track is a video.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackType.Podcast
member.summary: Indicates that the track is a podcast.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState
member.summary: Specifies the states of the current track within the Zune player.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState.Invalid
member.summary: The track is invalid.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState.Stopped
member.summary: The track is stopped.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState.Playing
member.summary: The track is playing.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState.Paused
member.summary: The track is paused.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackState.Buffering
member.summary: The track is buffering.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track
member.summary: Defines a track with all important informations from the Zune player.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an invalid instance of the class and sets all values to their defaults.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.#ctor(ZuneUI.PlaybackTrack,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with all required informations.
member.param: The zune track.
The zero based position of the track in the current playlist.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.ToggleRating
member.summary: Toggles the user rating of this track.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.ZuneTrack
member.summary: Gets a reference to the zune track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Valid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is valid.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Uri
member.summary: Gets the absolute URI of this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Index
member.summary:
Gets the zero based index position of this track in the current playlist.
If the index equals -1, then the track has no playlist.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Title
member.summary: Gets the title of this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Duration
member.summary: Gets the overall duration of this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Position
member.summary: Gets the current playing position of this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Artist
member.summary:
Gets the artist of this track.
Because this property is optional, the value may be string.Empty.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Album
member.summary:
Gets the album of this track.
Because this property is optional, the value may be string.Empty.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.ReleaseYear
member.summary:
Gets the release year of this track.
Because this property is optional, the value may be 0 or -1 if the release year cannot be found within the Zune library itself.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.CoverUrl
member.summary:
Gets the absolute cover URL of this track.
Because this property is optional, the value may be string.Empty if this track has no cover.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.CanRate
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this track can be rated by the user.
member.value: true if this track can be rated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.Rating
member.summary: Gets or sets the user rating of this track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.DurationFormat
member.summary: Gets the overall duration of this track as an formated string ([h:]m:ss).

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.PositionFormat
member.summary: Gets the current playing position of this track as an formated string ([h:]m:ss).

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.Track.RatingChanged
member.summary: Occurs after the user rating of this track has changed.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi
member.summary:
Defines the Zune LCD API class.
This class can be used to access the Microsoft Zune software.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.MAX_TRACKS
member.summary: The maximum track count for the method.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Note that you have to call the -method to start the Zune software.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Launch(System.String)
member.summary: Launches the Zune software with the specified command line arguments.
member.param: The command line arguments for starting the Zune software.
member.returns: true if the Zune software is not already running; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Launch
member.summary: Launches the Zune software.
member.returns: true if the Zune software is not already running; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Close
member.summary: Closes the Zune software.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Play
member.summary: Plays the current track.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.PlayAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Plays the track with the specified track index.
member.param: Index of the track.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the current track.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Stop
member.summary: Stops the current track.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Forward
member.summary: Goes to the next track (if any).

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Back
member.summary: Jumps to the beginning of the current track or goes to the previous track (if any).

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.GetTracks(System.Int32,System.Int32,VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackListCallback)
member.summary: Gets an amount of tracks from the current track list. The result is received through an asynchronous callback.
member.param: The start index of the current track list.
The track count (0 for all tracks).
The callback when the track data arrives.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ToggleFastForward
member.summary: Toggles the fast forward value.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.SeekToPosition(System.Single)
member.summary:
Jumps to the specified position in the current track (if the track is searchable).
The value must be between 0.0f and the duration of the current track.
member.param: The seconds.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ToggleMute
member.summary: Toggles the muted value.
member.returns: true if the Zune player is muted after this call; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ToggleRepeat
member.summary: Toggles the repeating value.
member.returns: true if the playlist within the Zune player is repeating after this call; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ToggleShuffle
member.summary: Toggles the shuffling value.
member.returns: true if the playlist in the Zune player is shuffling after this call; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Zune
member.summary: The Zune thread.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.CloseZune(System.Object)
member.summary: Closes the Zune software.
member.param: The sender is required for the delegate used with the Zune software.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Init
member.summary: The Zune init thread is used to initialize all event handlers used within this API. The thread will wait until the Zune software is ready for use.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ZuneSetup(System.Object)
member.summary: Hooks up to all event handlers which must be called from the Zune's dispatcher thread.
member.param: The sender is required for the delegate used with the Zune software.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Window_PropertyChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the PropertyChanged event of the Zune Window.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.StatusChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method will be invoked after the state of the Zune player has changed.
member.param: The sender.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TransportStatusChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method will be invoked after the transport state of the current track has changed.
member.param: The sender.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TransportPositionChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary:
This method will be invoked after the transport position of the current track has changed.
Usually this will be every 100ms if the track is playing. See for more details.
member.param: The sender.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Fastforwarding_ChosenChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ChosenChanged event of the Fastforwarding control.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Volume_PropertyChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the PropertyChanged event of the Volume control.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Muted_ChosenChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ChosenChanged event of the Muted control.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Repeating_ChosenChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ChosenChanged event of the Repeating control.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Shuffling_ChosenChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ChosenChanged event of the Shuffling control.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TransportControls_PropertyChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the PropertyChanged event of the TransportControls of the Zune player. This is used for low level access on the TransportControls.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.CurrentTrack_RatingChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the RatingChanged event of the CurrentTrack.
member.param: The source of the event.
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.CurrentPlaylist_ContentsChanged(System.Collections.IList,Microsoft.Iris.ListContentsChangedArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ContentsChanged event of the CurrentPlaylist.
member.param: The sender list.
The args.

member.name: M:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.GetTrackCount
member.summary: Gets the track count and invokes the event.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Instance
member.summary:
Gets the singleton instance of this class.
This value can be null if the class has never been instantiated before.
member.value: The singleton instance of this class or null.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Zune software is running.
member.value: true if the Zune software is running; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.IsReady
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Zune software is ready for use.
member.value: true if the Zune software is ready for use; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.WindowState
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the Zune Software window.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ShowInTaskbar
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Zune software window will be visible in the taskbar.
member.value: true if the Zune Software window is visible in the taskbar; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.PlayerState
member.summary: Gets the current state of the Zune player.
member.value: The current state of the Zune player.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackState
member.summary: Gets the state of the current track.
member.value: The state of the current track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.CurrentTrack
member.summary:
Gets the current track.
The track informations are only valid if is not TrackState.Invalid.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackType
member.summary: Gets the type of the current track.
member.value: The type of the current track.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackCount
member.summary: Gets the track count of the current playlist.
member.value: The track count of the current playlist.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.FastForwarding
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether fast forwarding is currently active.
member.value: true if fast forwarding is active; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Volume
member.summary:
Gets or sets the volume of the Zune player.
The value must be between 0.0f and 100.0f.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Muted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Zune player is muted.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Repeating
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the playlist within the Zune player is repeating.

member.name: P:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Shuffling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the playlist within the Zune player is shuffling.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Starting
member.summary:
Occurs when the Zune software is starting up.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Ready
member.summary:
Occurs when the Zune software is ready for use.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.Closed
member.summary:
Occurs when the Zune software just closed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.WindowStatusChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the window state of the Zune Software has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.PlayerStatusChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the state of the Zune player has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackStatusChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the state of the current track has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the current track has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackTypeChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the type of the current track has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackPositionChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the playing position of the current track has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackRatingChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the user rating of the current track has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.TrackListChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the current playlist has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.FastForwardChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the fast forward value has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.VolumeChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the volume of the Zune player has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.MuteChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the muted value of the Zune player has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.RepeatChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the repeating value of the playlist within the Zune player has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: E:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.ZuneLcdApi.ShuffleChanged
member.summary:
Occurs after the shuffling value of the playlist within the Zune player has changed.
Note that this event is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackListCallback
member.summary:
The callback for the method.
Note that this delegate is not thread safe, please take the necessary precautions.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.WindowState
member.summary: Specifies the states of the Zune Software window.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.WindowState.Normal
member.summary: The window is in normal state.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.WindowState.Minimized
member.summary: The window is minimized.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.WindowState.Maximized
member.summary: The window is maximized.

member.name: T:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackRating
member.summary: Specifies the user rating types of a track.
member.remarks: This is originally just an int value in the Zune software.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackRating.Invalid
member.summary: Track can't be rated.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackRating.Unrated
member.summary: Track is unrated.

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackRating.DontLike
member.summary: Track rating is set to "don't like".

member.name: F:VosSoft.ZuneLcd.Api.TrackRating.Like
member.summary: Track rating is set to "like".
